issue.title: [Python] Account for multiarch systems in development.rst
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-912](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-912). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some systems will install libraries in lib64

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-912?focusedCommentId=16682597) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This just came up recently. We should recommend that users pass `-DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=lib` when building the C++ libraries, as pyarrow cannot build if the libraries get installed in lib64

cc `[~kszucs]`
